entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who has been watching others die and is now being used by Dumbledore. He is asked to keep Harry alive so that he can die at the right moment.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who must kill Harry for his own death to be meaningful.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who has been keeping Harry alive so that he can die at the right moment. He is trying to teach Harry and let him try his strength.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is a person for whom Snape thought they were protecting Harry all those years.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who must die at the right moment so that Voldemort's death can be meaningful.

relationships.description: Voldemort must kill Harry for his own death to be meaningful.
Dumbledore has used Snape to keep Harry alive so that he can die at the right moment.
Dumbledore has been keeping Harry alive so that he can die at the right moment.
Snape thought they were protecting Harry for Lily all those years.
